description: Born on Ishigaki Island, Okinawa Prefecture, Hiromi is the quiet giant amongst the members of the SV2. Even though he looks rather intimidating, he`s quite gentle and hardly ever speaks. He tends the tomatoes in the greenhouse and looks after the henhouse at the SV2 in his spare time. His main duty in Division 2 is driving the first Labor carrier.
name: Yamazaki Hiromi
